message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet the highest standards of excellence. This product is not just an item; it's an investment in quality and performance. Considering its exceptional features and benefits, I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection. Let's discuss how we can make this opportunity work for both of us.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you're providing. I'd like to propose a counteroffer of $9500 for your product.

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. I understand your position and appreciate your willingness to negotiate. After careful consideration, I am proposing a counteroffer of $10800 for the product. This price reflects the high quality and unique features of the item, and I believe it offers a fair compromise. Please let me know if this proposal works for you, and we can move forward with the transaction.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your effort in meeting my expectations. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $10000 for your product.
